H0.text: Coming from the Sun is the best description of electrical energy.

H1.text: Attracting objects is what electrical energy is best described as.

H2.text: Moving negative charges is the best description of electrical energy.

H3.text: Developing radiation is the best description of electrical energy.

A4.text: Electric current is a flow of charged particles, such as electrons or ions, moving through an electrical conductor or space.

A5.text: When oscillating electric currents flow at the correct voltages within radio antennas, radio waves are generated.

A6.text: The motion of electric charge carriers is an electric current and produces a magnetic field.
